mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Finish the Floor", "Square Dance Date Book", "On the Record and Record Report", "As I See It, by Bob Osgood", "My Ideal Square Dance Partner, by the Ladies Who Square Dance", "Homes for Square Dancing", "The Dancer's Walkthru", "Overseas Dateline", "'Quick-Freeze' Your Dancers, by Roland T. Onffroy, Boise, Idaho", "12th Annual National Square Dance Convention", "Americana: The Big Tornado, by Terry Golden, Colorado Springs, Colo.", "Ladies on the Square: Cooking For a Crowd", "Style Series: Centers in (out) and Coast Off", "Under-Teach or Over-Teach by Jim Schanbel, Alexandria, Va.", "Round the Outside Ring", "Workshop", "The Caller of the Month: Russ Ard", "Paging the Roundancers: ed and Kay Mack", "Current Best Sellers: Record Sales Survey", and "Experimental Lab-Swing Thru".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
